entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
